tumOlumlamalar: I FEEL LOVE AND PEACE IN MY ENTIRE BEING, I AM CALM AND HAPPY AT ALL TIMES.
I BALANCE MY MIND AND BODY WITH LOVE, AND NOW I CHOOSE TO FEEL GOOD EMOTIONS.
I AM A DETERMINED PERSON, I SUPPORT MYSELF WITH LOVE AND APPLY MY DECISIONS WITH EASE.
I AM GAINING MORE AND BECOMING RICHER WITH EACH PASSING DAY.
I HAVE ALL THE RESOURCES I NEED TO CONTINUE MY LIFE IN THE BEST WAY POSSIBLE.
I AM GETTING RICHER WITH EVERY EXPERIENCE I ENCOUNTER.
LIFE IS A PERFECT WHOLE AND I AM A VALUABLE PART OF THIS WHOLE.
I CHOOSE TO EXPERIENCE THE BEAUTIES AND HAPPINESS OF THIS MOMENT, WHICH IS FILLED WITH JOY.
THERE IS ALWAYS A SOLUTION, AND I HAVE THE STRENGTH TO SEE AND APPLY IT.
I WALK WITH JOY AND CONFIDENCE, KNOWING THAT EVERYTHING WILL BE VERY GOOD IN MY FUTURE.
I CHOOSE A LIFE FILLED WITH BRAND NEW RULES THAT WILL SUPPORT ME FULLY.
THE COURAGE AND STRENGTH I FEEL INSIDE OPEN ALL DOORS TO ME.
EVERY THOUGHT AND ACTION I TAKE IMPROVES MY LIFE.
I HAVE THE POWER TO SEE WHAT NEEDS TO BE DONE AND TO ACT WHEN IT IS NECESSARY.
I AM CREATING A LIFE THAT I WILL ENJOY LOOKING AT AND LIVING IN.
MY LIFE IS RELAXED IN ALL ASPECTS, AND MY MIND IS FREE OF ALL OBSTACLES.
LIFE IS CONSTANTLY CHANGING, AND I AM EASILY ADAPTING TO THESE CHANGES.
MY MIND AND INTUITION SHOW ME THE MOST ACCURATE PATH.
I AM ALWAYS SAFE AND SECURE, SURROUNDED AND PROTECTED BY LOVE.
I CHOOSE TO MAKE MY LIFE EASY AND JOYFUL.
ALL THE VALUES OF LIFE FLOW TOWARDS ME.
I WELCOME NEW EXPERIENCES WITH HAPPINESS.
I ALWAYS LIVE IN THE BEAUTY OF THE PRESENT MOMENT.
I TRUST THE FLOW OF LIFE AND MY DESTINY, I AM AT PEACE.
I ATTRACT EVENTS AND PEOPLE THAT WILL BEAUTIFY MY LIFE.
EVERYTHING IS IN ORDER IN MY WORLD, ABUNDANCE AND PROSPERITY ARE LIMITLESS IN MY WORLD.
I CHOOSE TO LOVE LIFE AND ENJOY IT, MY CHANNELS OF HAPPINESS ARE WIDE OPEN.
I AM AWARE OF MY OWN POWER, AND I AM READY TO CREATE MY OWN REALITY WITH LOVE.
I AM FREE TO LIVE LIFE AS I EXPRESS IT, I APPROVE OF MYSELF AND MY DECISIONS.
I AM AT PEACE IN ALL OF MY EMOTIONS, I LOVE AND APPROVE OF MYSELF.
I CHOOSE TO LIVE MY LIFE TO THE FULLEST.
I GAIN GOODNESS AND BENEFITS FROM EVERY EXPERIENCE, AND I CHOOSE TO GROW AND DEVELOP.
I AM IN MY FLAWLESS POSITION AND ALWAYS SAFE.
EACH EXPERIENCE I ENCOUNTER INCREASES MY LIFE FORCE.
I BALANCE MY MIND AND BODY WITH LOVE, AND NOW I CHOOSE TO FEEL GOOD EMOTIONS.
THERE IS NO HARM IN EXPRESSING MY FEELINGS, I WANT TO FEEL THEM.
I AM THE SOLE POWER AND AUTHORITY IN MY OWN WORLD, AND I AM AT PEACE.
I AM GAINING MORE AND BECOMING RICHER WITH EACH PASSING DAY.
LIFE FLOWS TO ME AS IT SHOULD, AND I FIND WAYS TO IMPROVE IT EVERY MOMENT.
I FEEL AND REFLECT THE STRENGTH OF MY SOUL AND WILLPOWER.
I AM CLEANSED, PURIFIED, FORGIVEN, MY SOUL AND BODY ARE NOW VERY COMFORTABLE.
ALL THE VALUES OF LIFE FLOW TOWARDS ME.
MY MIND AND INTUITION SHOW ME THE MOST ACCURATE PATH.
LIFE IS ABOUT MY CHOICES, AND I AM THE ONLY OWNER OF THESE CHOICES.
LIFE ALWAYS HELPS ME IN ALL DETAILS.
LIFE IS INFINITE AND FULL OF JOY, AND I LOOK FORWARD TO EVERY MOMENT WITH EXCITEMENT.
I CHOOSE TO SEE MY OWN BEAUTY AND GLORY.
I EXPRESS MY DESIRES FREELY, THERE IS NO HARM IN EXPRESSING MYSELF.
I EXIST IN LIFE WITH LOVE AND SUCCESS AT THE CENTER.
EVERYTHING IS IN ORDER IN MY WORLD, ABUNDANCE AND PROSPERITY ARE LIMITLESS IN MY WORLD.
I RELAX MY MIND AND ALLOW IT TO BE FILLED WITH PEACE.
I AM A STRONG AND DESIRED PERSON, AND I ENJOY MY LIFE.
I RELEASE MY THOUGHTS FREELY, AND ALL WORRIES DISAPPEAR ONE BY ONE.
I AM A VALUABLE AND SPECIAL BEING.
I AM ATTRACTING PEOPLE AND CIRCUMSTANCES THAT WILL ENHANCE MY LIFE.
I POSSESS THE POWER TO MANIFEST MY DESIRES AND MOVE FORWARD WITH EASE AND CONTROL.
I INVITE SUCCESS AND LOVE INTO MY LIFE, MAKING EVERY DAY EASY AND VALUABLE.
BEING AUTHENTIC IS MY GREATEST STRENGTH, AND I LOVE MYSELF AS I AM.
MY ENTIRE BEING IS FILLED WITH ENERGY AND JOY FOR LIFE.
I LEAVE BEHIND ALL THE BURDENS OF THE PAST, AND MY LIFE IS PURE AND CLEAN.
I CHOOSE TO EXPERIENCE THE BEAUTY AND HAPPINESS OF THIS MOMENT, WHICH IS FILLED WITH WONDERFUL THINGS.
THERE IS ALWAYS A SOLUTION, AND I HAVE THE POWER TO SEE IT AND APPLY IT.
I AM AWARE OF EVERY ACTION AND WORD I SPEAK, AND I AM IN CONTROL OF MY LIFE.
I AM BREAKING FREE FROM THE PAST AND TAKING FREELY STEPS TOWARDS THE FUTURE. NOTHING CAN HOLD ME BACK.
I AM ALWAYS CONFIDENT AND SURROUNDED BY LOVE AND PROTECTION.
THERE IS ALWAYS A WAY TO FIND A SOLUTION, AND I AM STRONG ENOUGH TO SEE IT.
I INVITE ABUNDANCE AND SUCCESS INTO MY LIFE, MAKING EVERY DAY EASY AND VALUABLE. I AM SO MUCH BETTER NOW.
BELIEVE YOU ARE VALUABLE, BELIEVE IN SIGNS, BELIEVE IN YOUR DREAMS, BELIEVE IN YOUR INNER VOICE, BELIEVE IN YOUR TALENTS.
I ACCEPT ALL THE ABUNDANCE, JOY, AND LOVE THAT THIS BEAUTIFUL DAY WILL BRING ME WHEN I WAKE UP.

I AM FOCUSING ON THE BEST POSSIBLE OUTCOMES FOR MY LIFE. I AM ENJOYING THE PRESENT MOMENT AND LIVING IN THE HERE AND NOW. I TRUST IN DIVINE POWER AND AM IN FLOW. MY LIFE IS FULL OF ENDLESS OPPORTUNITIES AND CHANCES, AND I AM ALWAYS LUCKY AND AWARE OF IT.
I CANCEL OUT NEGATIVE FEELINGS, HARMFUL WORDS, AND THOUGHTS. I CANCEL OUT ANY EVIL EYE AND AM OPEN TO GOOD AND PERFECTION.
I TRUST IN MY OWN DECISIONS AND HAVE CONFIDENCE IN MYSELF AND MY BODY. I HAVE FAITH IN MY FUTURE AND TOMORROW, AND KNOW THAT DIVINE FLOW IS WORKING IN MY FAVOR AND TAKING SHAPE.
I LOVE AND BELIEVE IN MYSELF. I AM SUFFICIENT FOR MY LIFE AND MY SURROUNDINGS, AND MOST IMPORTANTLY, I AM ENOUGH FOR MYSELF. I AM FABULOUS JUST THE WAY I AM.
I AM A MIRACLE, AND EVERYTHING COMES TO ME FOR MY HIGHEST GOOD. I AM OPEN TO ALL PAST, PRESENT, AND FUTURE MIRACLES IN MY LIFE. MY LUCK AND HAPPINESS ARE ALWAYS AT THE HIGHEST LEVEL.
I LOVE MONEY. I TRUST IN THE FLOW OF MONEY. MY BANK ACCOUNTS ARE FULL OF MONEY. I EASILY AND CONSTANTLY ATTRACT MONEY INTO MY LIFE. I AM IN PERFECT HARMONY WITH MONEY.
I DESERVE THE MOST FABULOUS LIFE. I DESERVE GREAT WEALTH. I DESERVE PERFECT LOVE. I DESERVE GOOD FEELINGS. I DESERVE TO LIVE MY DREAMS. AND SO IT IS!

I HAVE UNINVENTIONALLY CREATED ALL THE BLOCKAGES THAT WAS INVOLVED AND WAS CREATING AN INCIDENT, I CANCELED THEM ALL. I OPEN MYSELF TO UNLIMITED ORGANIZATION, I GET UNLIMITED POSITIVE. MY LIFE IS MIRACLE.

ALL OPPORTUNITY IS OPEN, MY DOORS ARE OPEN, ALL SOLUTIONS ARE WITHIN ME. ALL THE BEAUTY IS IN MY HAND. ALL THE ROADS I WALK OPEN. MY will is enough for me to succeed, I am aware of the strength within myself.
I AM AWARE AND ACCEPTANCE OF EVERY SITUATION THAT OCCURS MYSELF. I INSTALLED MY PERFECT LIFE AND I EXPERIENCE MIRACLES. THANK YOU FOR EVERYTHING I EXPERIENCE, I RELY ON THE DIVINE AND ENERGY FLOW.
I LOVE TO ACCEPT ALL THE BEAUTY THAT SERVE AND WILL SERVE MY BEST FROM THE UNIVERSE, I ACCEPT THE FULFILLMENT OF MY WISHES. I EMBRACE THE UNIVERSE WORKING TO ME WITH LOVE AND EXCITEMENT.
I LOVE AND PROTECT MYSELF. I'M PROUD OF BEING MYSELF. I'M FILLED WITH PEOPLE THAT LOVE AND ACCEPT ME AS I AM, MY WHOLE SOUL AND HEART IS FILLED WITH GOODNESS, I RECEIVE THE REFUND FOR MY WORK.
I'M IN RECIPIENT FREQUENCY, I COOPERATE WITH GREAT STRENGTH, MY EVERY PRAYER IS HEARD AND ACCEPTED. I ATTRACT EVERYTHING I WANT into my life. I DESERVE AND DESERVE ALL BEAUTY.
I AM MAGNIFICENT WITH THE ENERGY I EXPAND. I ATTRACT ATTENTION IN EVERY MEDIA I ENTER. I AM A DESIRED AND WANTED PERSON. I TRUST MYSELF BODY AND Aura.
I CHOOSE TO BE A GOOD PERSON. I ACCEPT GOODNESS ENERGY. I INTEND TO BE TOGETHER WITH GOOD PEOPLE. I MAKE MY LIFE BEAUTIFUL BY DOING GOOD.
I CARE FOR MY PHYSICAL HEALTH AND MY MENTAL HEALTH. I CANCEL THE EXTERNAL FACTORS THAT WILL DESTROY MY HEALTH. I INTEND TO BE HEALTHY AND HIGH MOTIVATION.
I ACCEPT MIRACLES. I INTEND A WEEK FULL OF MIRACLES. CHANCE IS FLOWING INTO MY LIFE. WHATEVER STEPS I TAKE WILL RESULT POSITIVELY.
I CHOOSE THE PEACEFUL PATH. I KNOW WHAT WILL BRING ME PEACE. I REMOVE NEGATIVE ENERGY PEOPLE FROM MY LIFE. I TAKE ONLY POSITIVE THINGS IN THE UNIVERSE THAT WILL SERVE MY WELLNESS.
I ACCEPT THE LOVE THAT IS GOOD ABOUT ME, THAT WILL EQUIP ME WITH HIGH LOVE. I LOVE AND LOVE IT VERY MUCH. I AM EQUIPPED WITH UNLIMITED LOVE AND HEALING. LOVE IS SO GOOD TO ME, I AGREE!
I AM GETTING FROM ANY TIES THAT OBSTACLE ON MY PATH. I AM GROWING FROM THE BAD ENERGY OF THE PAST. I AM GROWING FROM THE NEGATIVE FEELINGS THAT AFFECT MY MOTIVATION.
I OPEN MY HEART TO ALL MIRACLES THAT MAKE ME POSSIBLE. I ALLOW MY HEART TO EXPERIENCE EVERYTHING POSITIVE.
I AM FREEDOM FROM MY PAST. I FORGIVE MYSELF FOR THE INJURIES I MADE MYSELF. I LEFT MY REGRETS BEHIND. I AM FREE AND READY FOR THE MIRACLES OF THE FUTURE.
ONE BY DREAMS COME ACTIVE WHAT I WANT AND I DREAM COME TO LIFE, I TRUST MY THOUGHT STRENGTH AND MY ENERGY IS VERY HIGH.

I HAVE REMOVED EVERYONE WITH BAD ENERGY IN MY LIFE. I INTEND TO SELECT POSITIVE SITUATIONS FOR MYSELF. MY ENERGY AND SOUL IS FULL OF HEALING AND PEACE. I CHOOSE POSITIVE. WHOM I DON'T PERMIT NEGATIVE INTERVENTION AGAINST ME.
I CHANGED MY SENTENCES. THERE ARE NO NEGATIVE OR MISSING FEELINGS IN MY WORDS. I ALWAYS PREFER POSITIVE THINGS. MY LIFE CHANGED WITH MY WORDS.
RIGHT NOW I'M ATTRACTING EVERYTHING I WANT INTO MY LIFE. THERE IS NOTHING I CAN'T MAKE WITH MY BRAIN POWER.
I AM AWARE OF THE STRENGTH OF MY SOUL AND MY WILL. I GO EASILY AND PEACEFULLY ON MY PATH.
I'M LEAVING THE BACKGROUND OF THE PAST, MY LIFE IS CLEAN AND CLEAR.
I AM THE ARCHITECT OF MY LIFE, I CREATE THE BASIS OF MY LIFE AND I CHOOSE HOW IT WILL FILL IT.
My HEART DESERVE PEACE. I FORGIVE EVERYTHING AND EVERYONE.
THE RIGHT CHOICES AND THE RIGHT PEOPLE COME TO ME. I'M PROTECTED, I'M A LUCKY MAN.
I DESERVE LOVE AND RESPECT WITHOUT CONDITIONS. I DESERVE THE BEST OF EVERYTHING. I AM THE MIRACLE ITSELF, I AM THE MIRACLES.
I INTEND TO BREACH ALL THE NEGATIVE TIES THAT I CARRY ON MY SHOULDERS FROM THE PAST TO TODAY AND LIMIT MY FUTURE.
I CANCEL ALL OBSTRUCTIONS THAT I HAVE CREATED WITH MYSELF, WITH OR NOT AWARE. EVERYTHING I NEED IS GIVEN TO ME WITH LOVE AND I ACCEPT IT WITH LOVE AND THANK YOU.
I ALWAYS CHOSE TO HAVE AWARENESS AND SEE BEAUTIFUL ON MY LIFE PATH. I WISH A LIFE FILLED WITH HEALTH, PEACE AND HAPPINESS. EVERYTHING IS GOING TOWARDS THE GOOD IN MY LIFE.
I ATTRACT RICHNESS, LOVE AND CHANCE FROM I KNOW AND UNKNOWN RESOURCES. I BELIEVE IN MIRACLES. I HEARLY BELIEVE THAT I WILL LIVE BEAUTIFUL DAYS.
I CHOOSE TO FORGIVE EVERYTHING AND EVERYTHING IN THE PAST. I'M CLEANING FROM EVERYTHING THAT HAPPENED TO ME. I CHOOSE TO LOOK AT EVERYTHING WITH LOVE AND SEE IT BEAUTIFUL.
With EVERY BREATH I TAKE, I BREATHE PEACE. WITH EVERY BREATH I EXPRESS, I CLEAN FROM EMOTIONS THAT DO NOT BELONG TO ME. I AM HEALING BODY AND SPIRITUALLY.
I COMPLETELY RELEASE MY FAMILY FAILURE. MY LUCK STAR SHINES ALWAYS.
I'M GETTING FROM MY DREAMS. I RELEASE MY MIND. I LET EVERYTHING FLOW, INSTEAD OF BEING MORE RESTRACTIVE BY CONTINUOUS THINKING.
I RELEASE MYSELF FROM ALL AREAS IN WHERE I HAVE BEEN SHALLING MYSELF FOR HONEST AND REJECTING MY ACHIEVEMENTS FOR NOT BEING HORRIBLE.
LOCK AND MY KEY! ALL THE LOCKS I PUT ON MY BODY, MY MIND, AND MY LIFE ARE OPENING. I REALIZE MY INFINITE POTENTIAL.

AFFECTS FOR RELATIONS AND LOVE
The child in me is discovering love today.
I'm surrounded by love and everything is fine.
My heart is always open to love and I radiate love.
All my relationships are long-lasting and loving.
My wife is the love of my life and the center of my universe.
My partner loves me as much as I love him.
I love myself and everyone, and everyone loves me in return.
I find love everywhere I go. Life is joyful and beautiful.
My wife and I are not a perfect match for each other and the love between us is huge.
I understand my partner perfectly, I can see his point of view.
No matter what happens in my relationship, love and forgiveness are the foundation of this relationship.
I scatter love and it comes back to me multiplied many times over.
I am in love with a wonderful person who is caring, devoted, loyal, reliable and understanding.
An endless energy of love is constantly swirling around me.
I have so much love to give.
I attract love effortlessly.
I am grateful for the love around me.
There is always love in my life.
I love with compassion and understanding.
